content: Hi, it seems only the llvm backend has a bx.type_void() method. I'm trying to codegen a custom intrinsic that has a void function type, but no such primitive exists on the BaseTypeMethods trait. What should I use instead? thanks
@bjorn3 I see. I'm a bit confused with this stuff, do the actual implementations for BaseTypeMethods reside in the concrete backend dirs?
Both in cg_llvm and cg_gcc. Cg_clif currently doesn't use cg_ssa for MIR codegen.
I see thanks. cg_gcc is new, I'm not familiar with this. Where can I read about it?
